function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underestimation of personal risk of infection","Impact":"Failure to engage in protective behaviors, increased likelihood of infection spread","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness of personal risk, provide accurate information on infection rates","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, digital communication platforms","People":"Citizens, individuals","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on mobility","Impact":"Shift in transportation behaviors leading to health and equity concerns","Mitigation":"Developing safer public transportation solutions, addressing equity issues in mobility","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, sanitation technology for public transport","People":"Public transport users, residents of urban areas","Owner":"Transport authorities, urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges for public transport systems","Impact":"Structural changes in public transport, increased reliance on private mobility","Mitigation":"Investing in health and safety measures for public transport, promoting sustainable transport options","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, electric vehicle infrastructure","People":"Public transport users, commuters","Owner":"Public transport authorities, city governments"}]}
